name: FE6SYNT
description:
FE6SYNT

Welcome to the cave communities that live in their own trash.  Climb as far as you can and explore the world through time, space and magic.

Please be patient! The game is about 40 MB and the loader might not show progress properly. Pompous Trash Jam

This game was made in 10 days for the pompous trash jam. All assets are original.

The jam modifiers have been implemented in the game like this:

  • Lost and Found
    • The whole color palette and a lot of its visual content is based on a drawing I did a while ago that I never got to use for anything. The devil book's contents is also something I made a while ago that I never got to use.
  • Snap crackle pop
    • Story dialogue in this game is spoken in the following languages: Turkish, Serbian and Filipino. The voice actors cannot understand these languages. We used google translate and then mimicked google's text-to-speech of said translation.
  • Scrubs only :
    • This game has a weird control scheme (type on keyboard to cast spells). And the ricocheting hookshot is very hard to control because it ricochet about 6 times before you arrive at your new destination.
How to play (Warning: Spoilers)

I recommend trying to play this game without reading what's below. Part of the fun in this game is figuring out how to play it and what spells do what.

Cast spells by typing on your keyboard. ex: for the spell geronimo, you just type geronimo and you're good.

There are 4 spells that do different things:

  • sesamsesam
    • Use this spell to start the game after the intro is done
    • This spill might have more uses when you have found a certain place of interest
  • geronimo
    • After the intro you will be inside the cave world
    • Using the geronimo spell you will shoot a hookshot that ricochets about 6 times
    • Use this spell to climb up the cave system and explore the communities of the trashy cliff people
  • houston
    • Use this spell if you ever get stuck inside the cave walls (this happens sometimes)
  • 321liftoff
    • In order to unlock the secret scriptures you must use this spell to help relieve the devils of their pain
    • Put your cursor over a devil and cast the spell
    • Once you have helped enough of the devils you will be able to see the scriptures inside your devil book -- they will tell you what to do next
